rows.label: qst701204_msg0001
rows.name: What, just a single piece of paper?

rows.label: qst701204_msg0002
rows.name: It says Nox Promontory, but that's it.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0003
rows.name:
You could have at least
left a signature. Now we
don't know what this is.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0005
rows.name:
It looks like it was written
with a glass pen. It has a
unique shading when it dries.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0006
rows.name:
A glass pen...? A pen made of
glass!? Does such a thing exist?

rows.label: qst701204_msg0007
rows.name:
It's one of Iira's hidden gems,
known only to those who know. It's
popular among some enthusiasts.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes, which means it's possibly
written by Thales himself.

rows.label: qst701204_msg0009
rows.name:
This Nox Promontory place...
it seems worth a visit.
